title: Cannot Login in game
body:
I just type my name and password I even tried on my other 3 accounts, but after inserting my password all I see it says logging on and never log in...? 
can you guys help me ?{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
Hey there AceAkali,

Have you tried to repair your client? If not,  I'd suggest you try to repair you client.

If this does not work then try to disable the ''allow the peer to peer transfer''.

Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?
